alert.note: Alert for Rogers; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 3:18PM CDT until May 06 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Caney River near Collinsville affecting Tulsa and Rogers Counties. Arkansas River near Muskogee affecting Muskogee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Caney River near Collinsville. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, minor agricultural flooding occurs. County roads north of Collinsville may be covered with water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 26.8 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
